name: h3
description: The Louisville Slugger MLB Prime C271 Birch Wood Bat is expertly crafted for both contact and power hitters seeking a balanced swing feel. Featuring a sleek black colorway, this bat boasts a huge sweet spot, making it ideal for players aiming to maximize their hitting potential. Its flared knob and thin handle provide enhanced grip and control, while the cupped barrel end ensures optimal weight distribution. With an impressive drop 3 length to weight ratio and pro-hardened compression for a harder hitting surface, this bat is ink dot certified, ensuring pro-grade durability and performance on the field.
